Select a date Do you really want to delete this item? Record deleted successfully! Operation failed Image added to your favorites! Image already exists in your favorites! No image to save HD url not available Welcome to Nasa Image of the Day! Your last login was on NasaAppPrefs dateKey To search a new image, tap the date selector and pick a date.\nThen press "search" button Nasa Image of the Day Search Open HD image on browser Save Clear See Favourites Close Back to Main open
//bbcnews Help menu The selected row is: The database id: Back to front Yes No Check information Introduction for this page: Home page Favourite list Refresh Do you want to delete? Added to favourite list Search Type here
type lon info type lat info Search Add to Favorite Show Favorite List Do you want to delete index Delete Help Hide List Activity Menu Type in lat and lon of image, then a new page will be loaded and all information will be present. There are 3 buttons on next page, the add button can add the image into the database, the show button can show the full list of image. If you click on the item, detial informaiton of that item will be shown up, hide button will hide list. The image has been add to Favourite List You click help Date: source: Service Version: Image Information: Image ID: HIDE
//Guardian string open close
The Guardian News Enter key word without space Search Click on the following link to access the news: Section Name of this article: Add to Favorite Favorite List Welcome to The Guardian News
You clicked on the overflow menu You clicked on question icon 1. Enter a key word in the search area, then click on "Search" button to search for news with the key words. 2. In the News list, click on one item to see details about a news. 3. In the detailed news page, click on the Url to read the news. Click on "Add to Favorite" to add this news to the favorite list. 4. In the main menu, there is a favorite button on the toolbar, click on it to see the list of favorite news. 5. In the Favorite list, short click to see details about the news, and long click to delete the news from favorite list.
Yes No Dismiss
